name: Gigaton Hammer
description: You swing your whole body around to attack with your huge hammer. Make a melee attack roll, dealing 3d8 + MOVE steel damage on a hit. This move cannot be used on consecutive turns by the same creature.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
